name: ltsubposd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))

stmt.origin: syl2anc(w0, wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)), wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cr))
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))

body.origin: |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wb(wbr(nat0, clt, c0), wbr(co(c1, cmin, c0), clt, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cr))

comment: Subtracting a positive number from another number decreases it. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-May-2016.)
